trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of management objects based on a specified query.
This class is one of the more commonly used entry points to retrieving management information.

For example, it can be used to enumerate all disk drives, network adapters, processes and many more management objects on a system, or to query for all network connections that are up, services that are paused, and so on.

When instantiated, an instance of this class takes as input a WMI query represented in an <xref href="System.Management.ObjectQuery"></xref> or its derivatives, and optionally a <xref href="System.Management.ManagementScope"></xref> representing the WMI namespace to execute the query in.
It can also take additional advanced options in an <xref href="System.Management.EnumerationOptions"></xref>.

When the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher.Get"></xref> method on this object is invoked, the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> executes the given query in the specified scope and returns a collection of management objects that match the query in a <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class.
After some properties on this object are set, the object can be used to invoke a query for management information.
This is the default constructor.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class used to invoke the specified query for management information.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
An <xref href="System.Management.ObjectQuery"></xref> representing the query to be invoked by the searcher.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class used to invoke the specified query for management information.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The WMI query to be invoked by the object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class used to invoke the specified query in the specified scope.
If no scope is specified, the default scope (<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath.DefaultPath%2A>) is used.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
A <xref href="System.Management.ManagementScope"></xref> representing the scope in which to invoke the query.
An <xref href="System.Management.ObjectQuery"></xref> representing the query to be invoked.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class used to invoke the specified query in the specified scope.
If no scope is specified, the default scope (<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath.DefaultPath%2A>) is used.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The scope in which to query.
The query to be invoked.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class to be used to invoke the specified query in the specified scope, with the specified options.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
A <xref href="System.Management.ManagementScope"></xref> specifying the scope of the query.
An <xref href="System.Management.ObjectQuery"></xref> specifying the query to be invoked.
An <xref href="System.Management.EnumerationOptions"></xref> specifying additional options to be used for the query.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher"></xref> class used to invoke the specified query, in the specified scope, and with the specified options.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The scope in which the query should be invoked.
The query to be invoked.
An <xref href="System.Management.EnumerationOptions"></xref> specifying additional options for the query.
Invokes the specified WMI query and returns the resulting collection.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
A <xref href="System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection"></xref> containing the objects that match the specified query.
Invokes the WMI query asynchronously, and binds to a watcher to deliver the results.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The watcher that raises events triggered by the operation.
Gets or sets the options for how to search for objects.
Property Value
The options for how to search for objects.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns an <xref href="System.Management.EnumerationOptions"></xref> that contains the options for searching for WMI objects.
Gets or sets the query to be invoked in the searcher (that is, the criteria to be applied to the search for management objects).
When the value of this property is changed, the <xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher> is reset to use the new query.
Property Value
The criteria to apply to the query.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns an <xref href="System.Management.ObjectQuery"></xref> that contains the query to be invoked in the searcher.
Gets or sets the scope in which to look for objects (the scope represents a WMI namespace).
When the value of this property is changed, the <xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher> is re-bound to the new scope.
Property Value
The scope (namespace) in which to look for objects.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.Management.ManagementScope"></xref> that contains the scope (namespace) in which to look for the WMI objects.
